text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Administration" means the Child Support Enforcement Administration of the Department of Human Resources.

section.section: "Employer" means any person who is paying earnings to an obligor.

text.section:
"Local support enforcement office" means 1 of the following that is responsible for support enforcement:
a county agency; or
a component of the circuit court for a county.

section.section: "Obligee" means any person who is entitled to receive support.

text.section: "Obligor" means an individual who is required to pay support under a court order.

"Support enforcement agency" means 1 of the following that receives support payments under a court order:
the Administration; or
a local support enforcement office.
